ygData.subject: Re: JBoots (the ever popular)
ygData.msgSnippet: Grab your little piles of bones and put your travelling shoes on and head for Guk.  It s down in Innothule swamp next to the troll city.  There you ll find
ygData.messageBody:
Grab your little piles of bones and put your travelling shoes on and head
for Guk. It's down in Innothule swamp next to the troll city. There you'll
find tons of little froggies just dying (sorry for the pun, couldn't resist)
to give you their woven armor.

A warning, though. Don't do it solo and check your pet with the coat girl
at the door unless you're extremely talented at keeping it under control.
I've seen so many pet related train deaths in that dungeon that those cute
little skeletons ought to come with a warning label from the surgeon
general.

Kaelrie (The Crimson Knights), DE necro on Fennin Ro.

> From: "Shadow Panther" <shdwpanther@...>
>
> Greets,
>
> I am curious if they've changed how you get Journyman Boots such as they
> changed the Oracle Robe to a quest (speaking of which, does he attack DE
> Necros?)?
>
> Also, if so how do I get started?
> And if not, what dungeon is she in & where's it located? I need to
know
> a level recommendation for the area & her, as well. It's been awhile
since
> I've heard much about them.
>
> On a seperate subject. I'm 14th level and still wearing the Sr.
> Apprentice robe. The rest of my armour, which isn't much at that, are
only
> cloth items. Greens can hit for 15, 20pts of damage, it's pretty sad. I
> know casters don't get much, but I know we get better than this. Could
you
> give robe & armour idea, where one may find them, level VS item (such as
> 25th being typical for full Bronze), etc? I'm half naked, and I'm
supposed
> to be a scary Necromancer. LoL Nothing all too impressive about this. :-)
>
> Thanks for the help. I don't focus on leveling much, obviously, but
I'd
> enjoy some new stuff. Finally, at 13th level, I got my Runed Totem Staff
> (for a higher price than I could've I later learned, but oh well).
>
> Thanks folks.
>
> Currently, I'm in the Qeynos area, but semi-soon heading back towards
> Neriak. Anything in these two areas would be nice to hear about. I know
> the Flowing Black Robe is in Najena in Lavastorm, but at my level I'm
pretty
> sure this is a weeeee above me. ;-) However, I would still like it.
>
> Thanks for any info folks. :-)
>
> ~Shadow
